name: The Custodian of ZX-42
description:
The Custodian of ZX-42

A 3D platformer created for Ludum Dare #42.

You are the custodian of the ever-growing and hostile planet, ZX-42.  Clean up the baddies, collect kindling, and return to your "safe-space" before it runs out!

Note: The executable runs smoother than the WebGL build. Thanks for checking out our game!

Planet Eight Games
